description: Great Trail - A bit technical but worth the trip. Love the views at the top.For bike rentals: We rented in Scottsdale (near Phoenix) at AOA-adventures for great weekly rates on GIANT and Specialized, allowing you to ride nearby McDowell Preserve or South Mountain.
directions: 101 freeway - exit FLW - follow frontage road to Bell. Turn Left and pass back under freeway. Follow Bell Road to N Thompson Peak Parkway. Turn Left. About 1 mile up Thompson Peak Parkway on the right side of the street you will see a sign for the Gateway trailhead parking lot...
title: Gateway Loop
